bridgeTransferFrom(address,address,addre.details: Transfers `amount` of the ERC20 `tokenAddress` from `from` to `to`.

params.bridgeData: Arbitrary asset data needed by the bridge contract.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

getSellQuote(address,address,address,uin.details: Quotes the amount of `makerToken` that would be obtained by      selling `sellAmount` of `takerToken`.

params.intermediateToken: The address of the intermediate token to        use in an indirect route.
params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

returns.makerTokenAmount: Amount of `makerToken` that would be obtained.
